string-array.name: help_array
string-array.item: Press the \'MEDITATE NOW\' button, to start meditation
Press the \'START\' button to start the timer. You can stop the timer anytime by pressing the \'STOP\' button
Options like changing timer, tune and silencing the phone can be changed by selecting the Settings icon on the top. Note that the selected tune will be played only at the end of the countdowntimer
If \'Silent the Phone\' is set to \'Yes\', the phone will be silenced if it is in normal mode, only during the set duration of the timer
If the phone is not silenced after selecting \'Silent the Phone\' to \'Yes\', change the priority preference from \'allow all calls\' to \'important calls only\'

string-array.name: benefits_description
string-array.item: Meditation synchronizes the left and right brain resulting in increased memory and IQ. Also, The working size of the part of the brain, which deals with attention and processing sensory inputs is increased with meditation<small>[Research done at Harvard, Yale, and MIT]<\small>.

Meditation is the number one stress-reliever and especially without side effects! This is because meditation helps stimulate the fuctions of hypothalamus and pituitary gland, the parts of the brain responsible for producing endorphins and serotonin, which are responsible for the overall happiness. <small>[article by Robert Nash, M.D., in the \"Journal of Orthomolecular Medicine\"]</small>

Reduction in the levels of pro-inflammatory genes, which correlates with faster physical recovery from any stressful situation was observed. Most interestingly, the positive changes were observed in genes that are the current targets of anti-inflammatory and analgesic drugs. <small>[Analyses by Institute of Biomedical Research of Barcelona in Spain]<\small>

The quality of skin improves by addressing it from inside out. As one enters a deep meditative state, the body automatically switches to a healing and regenerating mode. Also, meditation dilates the arteries, which increase blood circulation, and the skin improves!<small>[Studies by Dr. Herbert Benson of Harvard University]<\small>

Rest is a must for the body to function optimally and have the ability to ward off infections. Thoughtfree Meditation gives us the same benefits of dreamless deep sleep. Moreover, meditation stimulates the pineal gland (situated behind the human \‘third eye\’) which releases melatonin to help you sleep

Meditation relaxes the brain as well as the body. As the brain relaxes, the areas which control the involuntary biological functions like metabolism, heart beat and blood pressure are activated and as the muscles relax, good blood circulation is promoted. Studies are done to illustrate that meditation can alleviate symptoms, treat, and even cure many chronic ailments, including cardiovascular disease, hypertension, diabetes, asthma, PMS symptoms.
